user-info.name: Legal Name
user-info.name-desc: Make sure this matches the name on your government ID.
user-info.email-desc: Use an address you’ll always have access to.
user-info.address-desc: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.
user-info.q1: Why is not my info shown here?
user-info.a1: We are hiding some account details to protect your identity.
user-info.a2:
Contact info and personal details can be edited. If this info was used to verify your identity, you all need to get verified
again the next time you book—or to continue hosting.
user-info.q3: What info is shared with others?
user-info.a3:
Airbnb only releases contact information for Hosts and guests
after a reservation is confirmed.
